Author: cipi#4502
Content:
the problem with ETH gas is even bigger... look at this tx:  https://etherscan.io/tx/0x91ad987b51e9cf2838764150ab0c1d1b95ddef9e45f3d61bdd4548d5924332bb
value of transferred coin: $1.33
txfee: $0.37
so in order to not loose money, the margin should have been 50% or more on this swap
atm i help me by removing all ERC20 orders from orderbook when gasprice > 20 gwei
the above tx was with 21 Gwei, so i should remove the orders when gasprice > 5 gwei, but ok, i want to let people test all this üòÉ

Author: cipi#4502
Content: the other solution is to add a feature of `minvolume` for orders, so that the taker must buy at least x amount of the tokens for the swap to start... but that is not implemented yet
